Posts.EditableText:
Are you setting up the scripts for the correct verb?

That script looks like it should go in the TV's "switch off" verb.

Then when you switch off the TV, its description will be changed. Do you have an initial "look" description set up for the TV?

If you attach your ASL file to this forum post I can take a look to see exactly what's happening.
